name: AITraining
description:
This is a submission for GMTK Game Jam 2021.

An educational AI that is designed to train you to learn the basics of coding downloads a corrupted file. This file causes their code to effect yours. To repair them, and yourself, you must navigate the grid using the coding skills they taught you, all while their bad code runs parallel to yours.

Fortunately another AI, and instructional AI, is there to help guide you and give colorful commentary.

Controls:

  • Left Click when prompted to progress dialogue.
  • Escape to exit full screen, then again open exit menu in tutorial or game.
  • You can type in the player console to write code.
  • When executing code, you can choose to execute in debug mode. This lets you [Step] through your code, and AI's bad code, one line at a time. You can [Resume] the execute of the code to have it play through normally.
